mapper.select:
SELECT t.id id, t.cust_id custId, t.apply_no applyNo, t.apply_type applyType, t.business_no businessNo, t.busi_type busiType, t.contract_id contractId, t.seq_no seqNo, t.bespoke_date bespokeDate, t.acc_no accNo, t.trade_amount tradeAmount, t.create_time createTime, t.modify_time modifyTime, t.mchn_child mchnChild, t.apply_state applyState, t.trade_state tradeState, t.count count, t.success_count successCount, t.real_trade_amount realTradeAmount, t.channel_no channelNo FROM t_gq_fss_trade_apply t WHERE t.apply_type=#{applyType} and t.busi_type=#{busiType}
AND t.acc_no like CONCAT('%',#{accNo},'%')
AND t.business_no like CONCAT('%',#{businessNo},'%')
AND t.create_time >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startime},'%Y%m%d%H%i%s')
AND t.create_time <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endtime},'%Y%m%d%H%i%s')
